column2: Gini coefficient - Individual income from work (employed population)
column3: Gini coefficient - Equivalised monthly household income from work
column4: Gini coefficient - Unequivalised disposable household income from work after transfers (employed population)
column5: Share of top 1% - Pre-tax fiscal income (individuals) (excluding capital gains)
column6: Share of top 1% - Pre-tax national income (equal-split adults)
column7: Bottom quintile as % median - Gross monthly income from work (employed population)
